welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Boisbriand, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly locals, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our wonderful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mirabel Airport, primarily used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal used for domestic flights and some international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with free access for up to 60 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
